mapper.select: SELECT s.board_no, m.nick, dst1, dst2, div, img, title, desct, day_div, wage_div, price, cndt, addr_desct, stts, reg_Date FROM skilled_expert s LEFT JOIN member m ON s.mem_no = m.mem_no WHERE s.board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert:
SELECT 'SKL' || LPAD(skl_seq.nextval, 6, '0') FROM dual
INSERT INTO skilled_expert VALUES (#{boardNo}, #{memNo}, #{dst1}, #{dst2}, #{div}, #{img}, #{title}, #{desct}, #{dayDiv}, #{wageDiv}, #{price}, #{cndt}, #{addrDesct}, 'ky', sysdate)

SELECT 'SKLAPL' || LPAD(skl_apl_seq.nextval, 6, '0') FROM dual
INSERT INTO skilled_expert_apply VALUES (#{aplNo}, #{memNo}, #{aplMsg}, #{aplStts}, #{boardNo}, sysdate)
